assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Casta Diva Group S.p.A. operates as a communication company on Italy and internationally. It engages in the production of films, commercials, digital videos, videos for events and corporate, documentaries, and TV. The company also designs and manages events, such as conventions, roadshows, product launches, exhibition stands, team building, festivals, press conferences, Web events, celebrations, VIP parties, and video mappings. In addition, the company operates jazz club and restaurant; hosts jazz and live music concerts; and produces summer festivals and outdoor events for its partners and customers. Casta Diva Group S.p.A. is based in Milan, Italy.
